mapper.select: SELECT * FROM area_based WHERE addr1 LIKE '%' || #{regionName} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Favorite (email, contentid, areacode, cat1) SELECT DISTINCT #{email}, #{contentid}, #{areacode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat1 FROM area_based WHERE contentid = #{contentid} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Favorite WHERE email = #{email} AND contentid = #{contentid}
